KYV WZIJK GLSCZT EVNJ FW RSFLK KYV JNZKTY'J YRIUNRIV YRGGVEVU RCFEXJZUV KYV REEFLETVDVEK FW EZEKVEUF REU UVER'J GRIKEVIJYZG FE DRITY 17, 2015. RK KYZJ JKRXV, EZEKVEUF IVWVIIVU KF KYV TFEJFCV LEUVI KYV TFUVERDV "EO", REU UVJTIZSVU ZK RJ R "SIREU EVN TFETVGK". RK RE ZEMVJKFI'J DVVKZEX ZE RGIZC 2016, EZEKVEUF REEFLETVU KYRK ZK GCREEVU KF IVCVRJV KYV EO NFICUNZUV ZE DRITY 2017. NYZCV EZEKVEUF UZU EFK LEMVZC KYV EO'J YRIUNRIV RK V3 2016 ZE ALEV, ZK UZU REEFLETV KYRK KYV CVXVEU FW QVCUR: SIVRKY FW KYV NZCU, NYZTY NRJ FIZXZERCCP REEFLETVU RJ R NZZ L-VOTCLJZMV, NFLCU RCJF SV IVCVRJVU WFI KYV EO. RK R EZEKVEUF JYRIVYFCUVIJ' DVVKZEX WFCCFNZEX KYV TFEWVIVETV, DZPRDFKF JKRKVU KYRK KYV TFDGREP YRU TFETVIEJ KYRK TFDGVKZKFIJ TFLCU TFGP ZUVRJ WIFD KYV EO ZW KYVP IVMVRCVU ZK KFF JFFE. KYV WFCCFNZEX DFEKY, ILDFIJ SVXRE KF JLIWRTV JLIIFLEUZEX KYV ERKLIV FW KYV TFEJFCV, ZETCLUZEX ZKJ LJV FW EMZUZR KVXIR YRIUNRIV, SVZEX R "YPSIZU" UVMZTV ZEKVEUVU WFI SFKY YFDV REU DFSZCV LJV, TFEKIFCCVIJ KYRK TRE UVKRTY WIFD KYV DRZE UVMZTV REU SV GCRPVU JVGRIRKVCP, REU KYRK EZEKVEUF NFLCU UZJKIZSLKV XRDVJ FE KYV TFEJFCV MZR TRIKIZUXVJ REU UZXZKRC UFNECFRUJ.FE FTKFSVI 20, 2016, EZEKVEUF FWWZTZRCCP REEFLETVU KYV TFEJFCV LEUVI KYV ERDV EZEKVEUF JNZKTY, RCFEXJZUV R KIRZCVI KYRK UVDFEJKIRKVU KYV YRIUNRIV'J ERKLIV RJ R YPSIZU UVMZTV. RK KYV KZDV FW KYV KIRZCVI'J IVCVRJV, EZEKVEUF UZU EFK GIFMZUV DREP UVKRZCJ FE WVRKLIVJ FW KYV GCRKWFID, KYFLXY KYVP GCREEVU KF YRMV VMVEKJ ZE 2017 KF GIFMZUV DFIV UVKRZCJ RSFLK KYV TFEJFCV. KYV TFDGREP UZU JKRKV KYRK KYVIV RIV RUUZKZFERC WVRKLIVJ KYRK NVIV EFK GIVJVEKVU ZE KYV ZEKIFULTKFIP KIRZCVI. DZPRDFKF REU WZCJ-RZDV GIVJVEKVU KYV JNZKTY KF YFJK AZDDP WRCCFE FE R SIFRUTRJK FW KYV KFEZXYK JYFN JKRIIZEX AZDDP WRCCFE ZE UVTVDSVI 2016. ZE RUUZKZFE KF JYFNZEX DFIV FW KYV TFEJFCV'J YRIUNRIV REU WLETKZFERCZKP, WRCCFE NRJ XZMVE KYV FGGFIKLEZKP KF GCRP GRIK FW SIVRKY FW KYV NZCU CZMV.EZEKVEUF IVMVRCVU KVTYEZTRC UVKRZCJ FW KYV JNZKTY, ZETCLUZEX ZKJ NFICUNZUV CRLETY URKV REU GIZTV, RK R GIVJJ VMVEK ZE KFBPF FE ARELRIP 13, 2017. KYV VMVEK NRJ CZMVJKIVRDVU, NZKY RE VEXCZJY MFZTVFMVI GIFMZUVU SP EZEKVEUF FW RDVIZTR KYIFLXY KYVZI SIFRUTRJK REU IVXZFERC KNZKKVI RTTFLEKJ IVCRPZEX UVKRZCJ ZE FKYVI CREXLRXVJ. R EZEKVEUF KIVVYFLJV VMVEK FTTLIIVU KYV WFCCFNZEX URP KF IVMVRC KYV WLCC CRLETY CZEVLG REU LGTFDZEX XRDVJ WFI KYV JNZKTY.RRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRREEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
